name: BXT Christmas
description:
Android Update (12.09.2017)

Android Version is now available. Check it out by searching on Play Store "BXT Christmas" or by clicking on the following link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.BXT.Christmas

I hope you will enjoy it. This is my first game published on Play Store :)

First Update (03.01.2017)

-added highest score and highest wave information

-added information about the cannon power

-added game over sound

-fixed a bug where you will gain maximum power of the cannon very easily

-fixed the music slider

-added sound slider

-added snowing annimation on main menu and on game level

-minor UI improvements

HOTFIX: The "Replay" Button is now working properly!

This is my second game made in unity, so expect some bugs...

This game was made by Isar Bogdan Constantin.

BXT Christmas is still in development, so it will receive some updates. I'm also working on an Android version of it, so stay tuned. :)
